title: Gary Lorenz to Join Sensear Team
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/23/2015 @ 9:27 AM   Sensear 
NASHUA, N.H., Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Sensear is proud to announce the addition of Gary Lorenz as a Director of Sales for parts of the US and all of Latin America. Lorenz is a proven leader and industry veteran that brings Sensear a wealth of knowledge and familiarity in starting, developing, and managing distribution channels throughout the Americas. Before joining the Sensear team, Lorenz had more than 30 years of sales and marketing experience in the radio industry including over 25 years at Motorola and 5 years at Hytera. 
Lorenz says of his new position, "I'm excited to be a part of the Sensear team. This is a rapidly growing company with a lot of potential. With all the focus on digital open standards and interoperability, it's a great time to be part of the radio industry and Sensear offers a wonderful portfolio of high-quality audio accessories to complement these radios." 
Sensear VP of Sales, Marty Tynan adds, "We believe the addition of Gary Lorenz gives us an advantage in building and supporting a strong dealer network especially within the United States which is our core market." 
In addition to the vast experience garnered over his career in the radio industry, Lorenz also brings with him many contacts within the radio dealer community as well as years of participation and advocacy in such groups as: -- IWCE Advisory Board Member -- Co-Founder and Director of the North American TETRA Forum (NATF) -- Enterprise Wireless Alliance (EWA) Board Member -- Communications Marketing Association (CMA) Board of Directors 
About Sensear: Sensear is a global leader in developing and manufacturing best-in-class digital over-the-ear and in-the-ear headsets for use with two-way radio and Bluetooth communication devices. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/gary-lorenz-to-join-sensear-team-300147895.html
